description: This Dart source file is a Flutter widget implementation for the Assigned Deliveries screen in a delivery management app. It defines a StatelessWidget that renders a scaffold with a custom header and placeholder content for the delivery list, map, and contact actions.

classes.name: DeliveryAssignedDeliveriesScreen
classes.description: Main widget for displaying the assigned deliveries screen, including a header and placeholder list items.

classes.name: _Header
classes.description: A private widget for rendering the stylized header with an icon and title.

classes.name: _Row
classes.description: A private widget representing a stylized row with an icon and text, used for placeholders.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Build method for the main screen widget, constructing the Scaffold with AppBar and body content.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Build method for the _Header widget, rendering the container with gradient, icon, and text.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Build method for the _Row widget, rendering a styled container with an icon and text.
